text: Before I can start the print, you need to check a few things for me.
Is the buidlplate empty and clean?
KeyboardButtons: Ja, Buildplate ist leer und sauber

text: Is FILAMENT TYPE loaded and is enough material on the spool?
KeyboardButtons: Nein, falsches Material geladen oder zu wenig Material auf der Spule

text: We are ready to print. The print will take around XX hours. Do you want to start the print now?
The printer now heats up and starts printing soon.
Take the buildplate from the printer and bend it gently like in the video. Remove all printed parts and clean it with XXX. Afterwards put the buildplate back on the printer.
There should be a sticker on the spool with the information about the filament. It should be FILAMENT TYPE. One winding one the spool is between 30cm and 40cm. You need at least XX windings.
KeyboardButtons: Falsches Material geladen oder zu wenig Material auf der Spule

text: You need to change the filament. Do you need help with this?
Start Change Filament Guide. (not implemented yet)
Okay, just tell me when you changed the filament.
